meta.title: From FIELD to NOTES
meta.author: Sandy Weisz and Mao Reynolds
meta.message: [Field Notes](https://fieldnotesbrand.com/thelist) is a Chicago-based company that makes simple, durable, very handsome notebooks. We conspired on their [Clandestine edition](https://fieldnotesbrand.com/products/clandestine) a few years back. We're working with them on a new little thing. To find out about it when it launches, I might recommend joining their [mailing list](https://fieldnotesbrand.com/thelist). (This week's Raddles each use one of the 6 terrains from Settlers of Catan: hill, forest, field, mountain, pasture, or desert.)

ladder.clue: Gather on the bus, it's time for a <> {}
Wrap <> in two different letters to get an American college
Rotate one letter in <> 180Â° to get a kind of machine
Insert a letter in <> to get something in your clothes
<>-{}, a phrase that describes something in a handyman's toolkit
ladder.transform: is the shape of the pliers' nose

ladder.clue: Add a T to <> and anagram to get some tones
